name: Runner Drones
description:
Survive with your drone as much as you can!

Description:

Game theme:

Play in an endless generated city, avoid cars and drones to increase your score. Collect gems to unlock new exciting rewards and get the best score you possibly can.

Features:

Responsive drone controls Unlockable drones for you to unlock!

Endless procedular city

Gems Progressive difficulty

 

Controls:

WD to move left and right between lanes

S to move Up

D to move down

MORE INFORMATION
